channel.title: Click attack on npc nothing happens
channel.description: Ok, i just added Bork and skeletal horror to my [PI], But when i right click and push attack they dont attack. Ive tried adding them into npc.cfg but when i compile i get no errors, but then when i run the server i get an error... idk wtf is up with this... can someone help? But then ill keep then in spawn.cfg and there there. but i just cant attack them.. or add them to npc.cfg or i will get an error and cant run my server. any help please?

item.title: Click attack on npc nothing happens
item.dc:creator: @Get_Blitz Get Blitz
item.description:
@Get_Blitz wrote:

make sure you use tabs, instead of spaces

bump…[/quote]
Then what source has bork?
